task.title: How to write an email in Outlook.
task.shortdesc: In this task we will learn how to write an email in Outlook.

prereq.p: You need to have installed Outlook on your machine.

context.p: This task can help you to write different emails to your co-workers, friends, etc..

step.cmd: Press ''New Email'' option in home page.
Select the person to which you want to send the email.

result.p: All the fields are filled correctly and the email is sent successfully to the person to which you want to send it!

example.p: You can use this function when you want to send emails to your friends, co-workers, etc..
